# Shiny_SLE

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Shiny_SLE is to bulid a Shiny APP which will be used for querying 
gene expression.

Here, we offered datasets from bulk-RNASeq data and scRNASeq data.
